question: Supreme Court has made Right to Free Education as the part of which among the following rights?
option3: Right to freedom of speech and expression
explanation: As per Supreme Court judgements, the "right to education" flows from the "enforceable right to life and personal liberty" guaranteed by the Constitution under Article 21. This is because there can not be a dignified life or realisation of other rights of the person if he / she has no adequate education.
